headline: Packaging Corporation of America Announces Planned Management Changes
summary: LAKE FOREST, Ill., February 26, 2025--Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE:PKG) announced today the following planned management changes.

headline: Packaging Corporation of America Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: Packaging Corporation of America announced today that its Board approved a regular quarterly dividend of $1.25 per share on its common stock. The quarterly dividend of $1.25 per share will be paid to...
